name: One Bit
description: This is the story of Onebit, a poor, cute character that is continious searching for a pixel someone has stolen from him. He simply can`t go on with his life knowing that he is missin a pixel. Your task will be to go tro a long and exciting adventure, on his search for the one that have stolen his pixel and retaliation.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: intel i3 prossesor Graphics: GeForce GTS 150 Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: does not matter Additional Notes: You can probably get this to run on a potato
